attributes.action: Modernise Parliament, its members and our political system
attributes.additional_details:
MP's need to start listening to ALL of their electorate not just the ones who pay, the ones who join their party or the ones who offer deals.
It is absolutely shameful and absurd how MP's treat people in this country. There is no openness, honesty and transparency merely fulfilling a political party agenda and ideology regardless of what the electorate think
Mr Cameron needs to step down as the UK needs great leadership to bring everyone together to move forward NOW not in October
attributes.background:
Parliament is merely run as a political elitist business and this must stop!
Politicians have exposed their elitist arrogance, unprofessionalism and lack of leadership over the past few days since the most important electoral vote since the war but have now left a huge void

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
